9.heading: Devine, Indra.
9.title: "Thunder in the Skies"
9.author: story, Ron Fortier ; pencils, Christopher Jones ; letters & inks, Gary Kato
9.appears_in: 29 p. in The Boston Bombers, no. 2 (1990).
notes: "Last issue, we were introduced to the world of Indra Devine and the Boston Bombers. It is a world where Jesus was female and the Jews accepted her as the Messiah. The Catholic Church is centered in Jerusalem and has a female Pope. The Roman Empire has survived into current day and is now know as Rome South Africa. World War II never happened and the League of Nations became a powerful and strong military force. Indra and her Bombers are official agents of the League."
